Privacy Policy

Lemon Banjos is a small, one-person workshop. I only collect the information I need to respond to you, and I don’t use it for anything else.

Information I Collect

The only personal information I collect is what you choose to send me when you get in touch. This may include:

  • Your name
  • Your email address
  • Your phone number (optional)
  • The contents of your message or inquiry

When you submit the contact form, some basic technical information (such as your IP address) may also be processed automatically by the services that deliver the email or host this website.

How Your Information Is Used

I use the information you provide for one purpose:

  • To respond to your message and follow up about custom builds, setup/repair work, or warranty questions.

I do not sell, rent, or share your information with anyone for marketing or advertising.

Where Your Information Is Stored

I do not maintain a separate customer database or store form submissions on this website. When you use the contact form, your message is delivered to my email inbox through EmailJS, just like a normal email.

Aside from those email records, I do not keep additional copies of your information.

Third-Party Services

This site uses a few third-party services to function:

  • EmailJS – sends contact form submissions to my email inbox.
  • GitHub Pages – hosts this website.

These services may process basic technical data (such as IP addresses or browser information) as part of normal web operations. They handle that data under their own privacy policies.

Your Choices and Data Removal

If you’d like me to remove your information, you can ask me to delete the email thread that contains your message and contact details.

To request this, just email me at hunter@lemonbanjos.com.

Children’s Privacy

This website is not intended for children under 13, and I do not knowingly collect information from anyone under 13 years of age.

Changes to This Policy

I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time if the tools or services used on this site change. If that happens, the “Last updated” date below will be revised.

Last updated: November 2025
